content.en: SAR ship detection: Researchers have developed various algorithms to address different challenges in ship detection using Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) images. These algorithms, such as the coherence reduction speckle noise (CRSN) algorithm and the coherence constant false-alarm ratio (CCFAR) detection algorithm, aim to reduce noise, improve detection accuracy, achieve real-time detection, and enhance ship detection performance. By utilizing these algorithms, scientists are able to automatically and robustly detect ship targets in SAR images, contributing to applications such as sea traffic monitoring and maritime security.
content.da: SAR skibdetektion: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer for at imødegå forskellige udfordringer ved skibdetektion ved brug af syntetisk aperturradar (SAR) billeder. Disse algoritmer, såsom coherence reduction speckle noise (CRSN) algoritme og coherence constant false-alarm ratio (CCFAR) detektionsalgoritme, sigter mod at reducere støj, forbedre detektionsnøjagtigheden, opnå realtidsdetektion og forbedre skibdetektionsydelsen. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer er forskerne i stand til automatisk og robust at detektere skibsmål i SAR billeder, hvilket bidrager til applikationer som overvågning af søtrafik og maritim sikkerhed.
